website_summaries.verdict: Very affordable golf balls that are ideal for golfers looking to increase their distance.
pros: These extremely soft golf balls produce long distance through low spin and give great control while putting
Ideal for those with a slower swing looking to increase their driving distance
cons: Not ideal for those with a faster golf swing

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These balls are great. I like to aim them at my neighbors house.
customer_reviews.author: account deleted

customer_reviews.title: Just played this golf ball and th best golf ball I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Just played this golf ball and th best golf ball I've ever used. Was using ladies low compression and seemed that I had lost 20+ yards. This ball returned my yardage and has greater control around the green. Great for mid-high handicappers with a decent swing speed.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Wise

customer_reviews.title: Much longer drives!
customer_reviews.text: I am in my late 70s and in recent years was never able to hit long drives...........the first time I hit this ball I could not believe the distance.......at least a 20 yard longer drive, and it has been consistent. Love this ball!
customer_reviews.author: LTCJC

customer_reviews.title: Callaway Supersoft vs Titleist DT TrueSoft
customer_reviews.text: I had been playing Callaway Supersoft and really like them. I tried these and liked them as well. I have gone back and forth between them trying to decide which I should play . I have decided to stick with these. The Callaway Supersoft is a bit longer but not significantly. These Titleists are just so much better around the green and feel so much better off the putter. These hold the green better on my approach shots too. Both these and the Callaway are great balls at a reasonable price but I will continue to play these.
customer_reviews.author: KWWRG

customer_reviews.title: A Ball that Actually Delivers the Manufacturer's Claims
customer_reviews.text: Low compression, hence soft feel, golf balls are easy to find. This ball actually delivers the distance claims Titlist makes. I can only speak for myself, but I've been playing in mid-40d temperatures: the ball has a soft feel without being mushy. And the design is truly suited to folks with 90 mph swing speeds or less: the ball produces 10-15 more yards for me off the tee than the Titlelist Velocity or ProV1.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: ... have a low swing speed and this is a great ball. Great performance around/on green
customer_reviews.text: I have a low swing speed and this is a great ball. Great performance around/on green.
customer_reviews.author: KATIEMO

customer_reviews.title: TITLEIST DT TRUSOFT GOLF BALL - GREAT BALL FOR SENIORS
customer_reviews.text: I'm an avid 67 year old golfer in great shape but unfortunately don't hit the ball as far as I use to. I have tried a lot of different golf balls over the last 10 years to get more distance. I would recommend the Titleist DT TruSoft golf ball for any older player that has lost distance.
customer_reviews.author: RANDY M

customer_reviews.title: These are great. They have a great travel distance and are ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They have a great travel distance and are easy to see.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brown

customer_reviews.title: the ball checks up beautifully on the green
customer_reviews.text: I have used every Titliest ball that exists, these caught my attention due to price, I used them today in a light rain with damp conditions and I was driving the ball 10-15 yards past usually drives; the ball checks up beautifully on the green. I am 58 yrs old and a 15 handicap with a 93 mph swing speed. I just put three more dozen in my cart.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony P.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife's ex husband who won't go away for a Christmas gift. He hasn't come back and bitch about them and the wife says he likes them so all is good.
customer_reviews.author: Billieg

customer_reviews.title: Want more yards.... Use this ball
customer_reviews.text: Great golf ball. It's gave me 20 to 30 yards more on my drives and 10 on my irons. Made my game a lot easier. Instead of hitting 180 yd second shot to a 150 or 160 yd shot. My drives went from 210-220 to 240+. Give this ball a try, you will enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: VLHallTop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: Great Ball for the Money
customer_reviews.text: I never believe anybody when they say one ball goes further, than any other. This ball changed my mind, it seems to run out longer with the driver. I couldn't believe how it checks up on the greens. I'm 69 years old and with this ball I reached a par 5 green in 2. I got the birdie, missed the eagle by a few feet. I did lose 2 balls,because I reached water, that I always come up short with other balls. I'm glad I bought 2 dozen, because the price will most likley increase .
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Great Ball for Seniors
customer_reviews.text: Nice feel around the greens and offers distance from the tee.
customer_reviews.author: RWC

customer_reviews.title: Obviously not a dozen Titleist balls, not sure what this is!
customer_reviews.text: I opened the box on the golf course and could not believe what I was seeing. There were only three Titleist balls in the box, all the rest were something else. One ball even appeared to be used. Not sure what happened here, they are going back!
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Dussinger

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was incredibly delayed, with one excuse after another. We are VERY dissatisfied with the lack of prompt shipping. Our package arrived, with the box of balls being merely wrapped in brown paper. The box was damaged, and the golf balls had flaws on them. Poor product value, for the cost and wait, with this vendor! We love these Titlest DT golf balls, usually, but these were a very poor example of this product. They were seconds, at best! Buyer BEWARE.
customer_reviews.author: Mtntrek2

customer_reviews.title: To long
customer_reviews.text: These balls are good, but they take to long to get in the hole. Titleist needs to develop a ball that goes in the hole sooner. I will sometimes hit these balls 7 or 8 times before they roll into the hole.
customer_reviews.author: AMZN employee

customer_reviews.title: Titleist DT Tru Soft, Worst Golf Ball I have ever played
customer_reviews.text: This ball should be called no Distance. This ball is like a rubber ball on a paddle attached by a rubber band. It is like hitting a rubber ball. Poorest distance of any ball I have ever used, bar none. The Callaway Super Soft runs circles around this ball. Titleist should be ashamed of this one. I am either returning it or giving to Goodwill.
customer_reviews.author: David P.

customer_reviews.title: Better than Pro V1
customer_reviews.text: I had been using Pro V1's for years but this year decided that I may be just wasting my money because I am an average golfer (15 handicap). So I decided to experiment and tried the DT and am much happier. Higher trajectory, a bit more distance and a better feel putting. Just a more enjoyable game now. Leave the expensive Titleists to the pros that they are designed for (and they get them for free anyway).
customer_reviews.author: jw

customer_reviews.title: Great value ball that plays as well as the claims!
customer_reviews.text: I honestly didn't think a ball would make much difference in my game, but it did! I am a 55 year old woman who is semi athletic and has been playing for about 2 years. I have Callaway Solaire clubs, Odyssey EXO two ball putter, and Ping G400MAX Driver. I replaced the Srixon balls with Callaway wich I liked a bit better, and then over the summer the Callaway balls with these and I LOVE THEM!!!! I get a little more distance, a bit more accuracy, and smoother feeling roll off my putter on the green. I have seen my game improve and don't think it's just coincidence. I like them much better the the two other mentioned brands.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: DT TruSoft - I like 'em!
customer_reviews.text: Great price on these TruSofts. I'm a 15 and don't have quite the power to squish a Pro-V so these fit my needs - pretty long and pretty soft around the greens. I also really like the yellow. . .didn't think I would, but I can find my ball in the air and on the course quickly. Give them a try, you won't be disappointed. PS: Don't use them on a hole by a driving range. . .with yellow balls. :-)
customer_reviews.author: ~~Joe~~

customer_reviews.title: Lose your slice and improve it to a controlled fade
customer_reviews.text: That's the difference I've learned from using these balls for a summer. Golfed for 3 decades. Mid 80s. low 90s. Your incredibility poor housing hitting slice will definitely be turned into a controlled fade. Best of luck.
customer_reviews.author: holder

customer_reviews.title: Poor Man's ProV1
customer_reviews.text: This ball is very comparable to the highly preferred ProV1 without the pain of paying $40 (if you're anything like me 6 of these will be taken by the trees or water). It has very good distance, good enough friction for decent spin control, and a very great price. If youre a PGA pro, you may disagree, but for the average golfer this is the best ball out there.
customer_reviews.author: Marc E

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: To each their own, I am a mid handicapper and have tried these. For me I can not hit these as straight off the tee as other golf balls. Understanding it's more of a swing issue but non the less thats the feeling I get. I prefer the Callaway SuperHot.
customer_reviews.author: SRG

customer_reviews.title: Loved in our household!
customer_reviews.text: I reorder these regularly for my man. He loves them and always puts it back on his wish list for gifts. Lol. Happy to make him happy! And pretty soon, I will be ordering for our grandson! Good to know that I have a reliable source when needed. Thanks! I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: These balls do not appear to be brand new.
customer_reviews.text: I do like the TruSoft ball, but I do not reccomend buying this option. The balls I received were scotch taped shut and the sleeve order went 2-3-1-4. I inspected the balls and it looked like there were a few scuffs and misprints on the dimples. Looks like a returned package.
customer_reviews.author: HallaDurg

customer_reviews.title: Super soft impact
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic golf ball at the price point. I'm not into spending $45 for the top Titleist when I can get a similar feeling ball for nearly half the price. These are a fantastic substitution for any overly expensive, planet orbiting, life changing, hole-in-one causing ball on the market.
customer_reviews.author: campbellvt

customer_reviews.title: Great ball
customer_reviews.text: you can't beat Titleist products, these perform well for high to mid handicap golfer. If you hit the ball 275 yds off the tee these may not be for you but works for my 85-90 swing speed. Cheaper than Bridgestone e6 and a bit more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Bergen County Shopper

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: These appear to be used/opened/changed out! Idk... box packaging has been opened and sealed back with regular tape. The balls don't match each other... different writing. This is supposed to be a Christmas gift... just awful! :(
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bonilla

customer_reviews.title: Prefect for Senior Golfers
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these golf balls for a long time. While they are not Pro V quality, they are great for the more senior golfer who needs something with a lower compression. The price is excellent compared to local golf courses.
customer_reviews.author: kcallahan47

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a great ball
customer_reviews.text: I'm just a weekend golfer with about a 25 handicap so expensive balls aren't worth the money for me. I got a box of ProV1s for Christmas last year (I wouldn't spend the money myself for them) and I did see a difference in my distance and spin on the balls. That being said, I did invest in the DT TrueSoft because they were cheaper and I found no difference between the 2 balls. I'll buy more of these next spring.
customer_reviews.author: Michael F DeQuatro

customer_reviews.title: Titleist TruSoft balls
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try these after talking with golf folks about slower swing speeds and compression in golf balls. It's no coincidence that every company has come out with "soft feel" golf balls over the past year, at all. There has to be something to it. I loved the feel, performance and the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mike O.

customer_reviews.title: great value for the quality of the ball
customer_reviews.text: Seems to fit my average swing speed. Ball seems to check about the same on greens as ProV1 does for me. I also seem to drive the ball better both distance and control wise.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Zambo

customer_reviews.title: Great balls!
customer_reviews.text: These are the balls my husband likes to use. He’s picky but ultimately after trying others, he goes back to these balls. So I’d say he is happy I got them for him.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Trump

customer_reviews.title: Good ball
customer_reviews.text: The balls seem very nice. They have the feel I like but I can still slice them in the woods. Maybe I should take up bowling. At least I wouldn't lose the ball.
customer_reviews.author: Ermster

customer_reviews.title: was worth a shot
customer_reviews.text: I prefer the velocity balls more than these. The problem is the velocity can be a little too hot so I wanted something a little slower for the short game but they just didn't work well for my game.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Friscia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent ball for good price.
customer_reviews.text: Love these. One of the best soft golf balls. Good around the greens, soft feel to hit & putt. Durable cover. Price is right.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the non-professional golfer
customer_reviews.text: These are half of the price of the higher end balls and great for people who aren’t pro or anywhere near, and have the occasional/weekly water ball 😳.
customer_reviews.author: Floridaconsumer

customer_reviews.title: Devalue
customer_reviews.text: They were a gift for my brother-in-law. And he says they're really quick balls balls. And I liked it cuz of value of the price
customer_reviews.author: capitalone

customer_reviews.title: MEH, spend extra $5 and get better balls.
customer_reviews.text: These always balloon in the air instead of a penetrating ball flight. If you have good fast swing, this is not the ball for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More than worthwhile investment.  Workslike a "Titleist"
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color that lasts. Doesn't scratch up basically. Works like a "Titleist". I'll keep buying it.
customer_reviews.author: aj

customer_reviews.title: Very good golf ball
customer_reviews.text: We purchase these for our grandson who is an avid golfer. He likes them and says they are very good
customer_reviews.author: BMarcis

customer_reviews.title: All my shots are longer and control on the green too
customer_reviews.text: My driver swing speed is 80 and irons 60. I have found a new ball that gives me the distance I’ve lost the past few years.
customer_reviews.author: T. Shipp

customer_reviews.title: No stars if possible
customer_reviews.text: WATCH OUT! They don’t know the difference between white and yellow! I bought 5 yellow balls and got 3 white.
customer_reviews.author: Shogun

customer_reviews.title: Price deal of December
customer_reviews.text: Low compression, perfect for winter play. Great cover feel. Less than 20 bucks. Deal!
customer_reviews.author: Alan in SF

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  Very consistent reaction when hit or putted
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for a while. I'm an aging golfer with a swing speed in the 70s to low 80s. The ball acts great off the tee box and even better close to the green and putting. I'd recommend this ball
customer_reviews.author: J. Holloway

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent ball for the price. It is the standard Titleist quality and is excellent for a softer feel and playability around the greens.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Golf Balls
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. Item exactly as described. Highly recommend seller. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great balls to use for drives.
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Distance is nice. Lose control on short game.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Brown

customer_reviews.title: Love my Titleist DT
customer_reviews.text: Love my Titleist DT. Been using this golf ball for a long time. Still has that Titleist feel of performance but a bit harder cover so it last longer and the price is excellent. Yeah Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Norm B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to have delivered.
customer_reviews.text: Easier than going to Walmart. Price okay. My go too ball.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond H. Leach

customer_reviews.title: Titelist DT TruSoft
customer_reviews.text: Love the golf balls . Soft feel and goes farther for me. I normally golf 2-3 times a week and love these golf balls.
customer_reviews.author: DTS

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Titleist is a good name in golf. Good gift for a golfer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are much better than swing at the moment but think we will ...
customer_reviews.text: We are new to golf and are trying to find the right balls for us. They are much better than swing at the moment but think we will stick with the brand.
customer_reviews.author: Billie

customer_reviews.title: Going back to yellow balls!
customer_reviews.text: These are Titleist balls so you know they are good. Going back to yellow balls, hopefully easier to see....I need all the help I can get.
customer_reviews.author: D. Kam

customer_reviews.title: Soft feel, awesome distance
customer_reviews.text: I love trying different golf balls. I've tried almost all out there. I love this ball...soft feel, great distance, just enough spin on short shots and wedges. My buddy loves ProV 1, and really really liked this ball..he was mad at me for holding info about the DT Truesoft! Try 'em..you'll love them!
customer_reviews.author: KW Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Great golf ball for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to follow in flight. Very durable cover. Excellent distance and workability. It is however, a lower spinning ball made for distance. So the trade-off is short game spin. Overall it is a very good golf ball for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Soft. Golf balls
customer_reviews.text: This less expensive Titleist feels super soft. Reminds me of the Pro V1s. Definitely worth the price! I think I found my next golf balls!
customer_reviews.author: Renan Ducos

customer_reviews.title: Very adequate balls for the price. Distance is about ...
customer_reviews.text: Very adequate balls for the price. Distance is about the same as Chrome Soft and about the same with irons as far as stopping with spin. I'll buy them again. When will Pro V1 be available in yellow????
customer_reviews.author: lex lisenby

customer_reviews.title: Soft Feel + Great Distance
customer_reviews.text: I'm an occasional, female golfer who's just getting back to golf after a several year hiatus and hit my longest drive - 245 yards - with these balls. Love the feel & playability.
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: Great ball
customer_reviews.text: Best ball out there if you want distance and still have a soft feel for putting
customer_reviews.author: Jackp212

customer_reviews.title: Best ball for me at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I researched which golf ball was the best for my swing speed - I am a senior golfer - and tried a bunch of them. This Titleist ball gives me the most distance, control and works great for my putting. Always consistent and reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Feels soft coming of the club. Doesn’t seem to have the soft feel on the shell like the pro v’s do, but as mentioned the core is noticeably soft on power shots.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Wimer

customer_reviews.title: Good control
customer_reviews.text: Easy to stop ball on green. Irons feel good. Putter likes these balls.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love the golf balls , --now if they would just avoid water hazards ---
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: It's a Titleist ball. Enough said !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best golf ball that I have found for my swing speed. And the value of ordering these on Amazon is second to none !!!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan E.

customer_reviews.title: Good Golf Ball
customer_reviews.text: Very good golf ball for the price. Gives good distance and control at a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Don Douds

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: These are durable and just as good as pro v.
customer_reviews.author: JSK

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again!!
customer_reviews.text: Best ball for the price. They feel good of the club. The cover doesn't cut as easy as other balls in that priceed range .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Distance
customer_reviews.text: These give me longer distance of the tee then the new Titleist Velocity balls.
customer_reviews.author: bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Great ball for the money
customer_reviews.text: Awesome ball for the price! Good distance & spin and soft off the putter head.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Behrens

customer_reviews.title: Good ball
customer_reviews.text: They are great balls, I have used one sleeve for a couple rounds and only one ball is showing some wear. They work well for the money and the high handicap golfer.
customer_reviews.author: Japho

customer_reviews.title: Can't tell the difference
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't tell the difference but we're terribly inexperienced golfers so it would have been surprising if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Peace & Joy

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my boss- he loved them
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Hard As A Rock
customer_reviews.text: Very hard golf ball. If you want to control ball, try another golf ball.
customer_reviews.author: D. Gifford

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a middle of the road golf ball
customer_reviews.text: Great value for a middle of the road golf ball. At the rate that I lost balls, this price point is fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: ffinch66

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I used Pro v 1x. These are great for the money. I can't see a difference
customer_reviews.author: Jim R

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Got them for my son-in-law for Christmas. He loved them!
customer_reviews.author: M. Denton

customer_reviews.title: Get a box
customer_reviews.text: Good jump off the driver, good feel around the green
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: My Son was very Happy with these!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift, my Son said I did good! Good Choice.
customer_reviews.author: Super Mom

customer_reviews.title: Nice Ball At A Good Price
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a softer golf ball. The TruSoft feels good when I hit it and the price was very nice.
customer_reviews.author: R Wahlheim

customer_reviews.title: Great ball
customer_reviews.text: Playing golf. Great ball glad you had yellow it is hard to find
customer_reviews.author: Carol Frahm

customer_reviews.title: Farthest ball I've ever hit
customer_reviews.text: I normally hit pro v1 but for my swing speed this ball is at least 20 yards further
customer_reviews.author: slester37

customer_reviews.title: Golf balls that work for me
customer_reviews.text: They’re golf balls, it’s a personal preference. I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Nice ball for my game !
customer_reviews.text: Still getting used to the feel ! So far I like them !
customer_reviews.author: Louis, Jr

customer_reviews.title: Nice ball but not as long off the tee as ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice ball but not as long off the tee as I had hoped. Overall a good ball for the money.
customer_reviews.author: wwa

customer_reviews.title: You get exactly what is advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Delivered quickly and the golf balls advertised are the ones you get
customer_reviews.author: Scott B

customer_reviews.title: and he loved it! great price and fast delivery with prime
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a christmas present for a golfing fan, and he loved it! great price and fast delivery with prime :)
customer_reviews.author: charlie

customer_reviews.title: Rip off
customer_reviews.text: Missing a sleeve of balls, upon receipt of box. This sucks
customer_reviews.author: rosie

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Since I lose many golf balls this was an easy choice.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Stone

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality golf ball for a low cost. It has good control in all aspects of the game. Gives good length on my Drives and holds very well on the green.
customer_reviews.author: C. T.

customer_reviews.title: My new golf ball
customer_reviews.text: I’m a high handicapper and I feel like this is the right golf ball for me. Durable and great distance
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These balls are great!!
customer_reviews.text: These balls are great!!! I hit them further than ever before and the soft feel is wonderful. Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Marie Lockwood

customer_reviews.title: The distance and smile on my face
customer_reviews.text: Golf pro recommended these balls for me because of my age and slower swing. Love them and the girls in my group all bought them after watching me. What does that say
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite ball by far. As long off the tee as anything else I’ve ever hit and still has great feel around the greens for half the price of “premium” golf balls.
customer_reviews.author: Yamille Roper

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: One of the best balls for the money, especially for the weekend player
customer_reviews.author: brian Charltray

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Soft off the club face and better distance than callaway
customer_reviews.author: Tim W

customer_reviews.title: not the balls but these are great for the intermediate golfer looking for something better than ...
customer_reviews.text: Goes long and straight... into the woods. My fault, not the balls but these are great for the intermediate golfer looking for something better than putting rocks like some of the cheaper balls offered.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Saing

customer_reviews.title: Great for seniors
customer_reviews.text: Great distance ball for seniors. Added 20 yards to drive. Also holds hard greens better than other distance balls I have tried. Excellent buy’
customer_reviews.author: Ron R

customer_reviews.title: Titleist DT TruSoft Golf Balls
customer_reviews.text: this ball is for me . distance and short game is good
customer_reviews.author: mikyoung kim

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Used this type in the past. Work great and this is a price that is hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Titleist DT TruSoft Golf Balls (One Dozen)
feature_bullets: New longer distance through low long game spin
New improved short game performance for stopping power
